name: Influenza (Flu)
description: A contagious respiratory illness caused by influenza viruses.
prevention: Annual flu vaccine, hand hygiene, cover coughs.

name: Common Cold
description: A viral infection of your nose and throat.
prevention: Hand washing, avoid close contact with sick people.

name: Diabetes Mellitus
description: A group of diseases that result in too much sugar in the blood (high blood glucose).
seek_help: If blood sugar levels are consistently high or if experiencing frequent infections
treatment: Medication, insulin therapy, and lifestyle changes

name: Hypertension (High Blood Pressure)
description: A condition in which the blood pressure in the arteries is persistently elevated.
seek_help: If blood pressure readings are consistently above 140/90 mmHg

name: Tuberculosis (TB)
description: A potentially serious infectious bacterial disease that mainly affects the lungs.
seek_help: If cough lasts more than 3 weeks or see blood in sputum
prevention: Avoid close contact with untreated TB patients

name: Malaria
description: A mosquito-borne infectious disease that affects humans and other animals.
seek_help: If experiencing cyclical fever and chills, especially after travel to endemic areas

name: Asthma
description: A condition in which a person's airways become inflamed, narrow and swell, producing extra mucus.
seek_help: If experiencing frequent or severe asthma attacks
